summary: The customer was looking to buy a phone from Contoso Wireless, but was confused about the accounts. The agent explained that there are two types of accounts - prepaid and postpaid - and provided details on the benefits of each. The customer opted for a postpaid account and the agent provided instructions on how to set up the account. They also discussed data plans, roaming abroad, and additional benefits such as discounts. Finally, the agent offered suggestions on which phone would be best for the customer depending on their needs.
